item.description:
The Californian Massage is a journey of well-being for your body, mind and soul. For 90 minutes, you will be enveloped by gentle movements that gradually become deep and extensive, helping you to release accumulated stress and anxiety, providing a sense of serenity and balance. Its unique combination of massage techniques and essential oils allows you to immerse yourself in a world of comfort and rejuvenation, feeling more confident and prepared to face day-to-day problems.

Book now and enjoy the unique experience that is Californian Massage.

  • Duration: 90 min.
  • Price: 90 euros

For appointments and more information contact me

Notes:

  • You should indicate only one type of massage per session.
  • The transportation up to 5km from the center of Parede, Cascais county, is included in the price. For distances over 5km, an additional fee of 1.20 euros per kilometer.
  • Payments by MBWay, cash or immediate bank transfer.
item.title: Californian Massage
